title: Codepath
description: Codepath is an education technology platform that offers transformative computer science education programs to underrepresented minorities in tech. Their courses cover vital software engineering skills and industry-relevant projects.

title: Rewriting the Code
description: Rewriting the Code is a non-profit organization that empowers young women to pursue and excel in technology-related degrees and careers. They provide resources, programs, and a supportive community to encourage women in tech.

title: Women who code
description: Women Who Code is a global non-profit organization dedicated to inspiring women to excel in technology careers. They provide an avenue for women to showcase their skills and help companies diversify their technology teams.

title: Google Developer Student Club
description: Google Developer Student Club is a community program that helps students bridge the gap between theory and practice. It offers hands-on experiences on Google technologies and a platform to share knowledge.

title: Colorstack
description: Colorstack is a non-profit organization that empowers and supports underrepresented students of color in the tech industry. They provide mentorship, resources, and a community to help these students excel in their computer science education journey.

title: Hack Club
description: Hack Club is a nonprofit network of student-led coding clubs where members learn to code through tinkering and building projects. It aims to cultivate the next generation of tech leaders and innovators.

title: Enactus
description: Enactus is an international nonprofit organization that brings together student, academic and business leaders to transform lives and shape a better, more sustainable world through entrepreneurial action.

title: NerdWallet
description: NerdWallet is a personal finance company that provides accessible and unbiased tools and resources to help individuals make smart money decisions. They offer student-focused content on budgeting, loans, and financial literacy.

title: Collegiate Leaders Summit
description: The Collegiate Leaders Summit (CLS) is a premier annual conference that brings together student leaders from across the country to develop their leadership skills, network with peers, and explore career opportunities.

title: AIESEC
description: AIESEC is a global youth-led organization that provides leadership development and cross-cultural internship opportunities for students and recent graduates, promoting positive social impact.

title: Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers (SHPE)
description: SHPE is a national organization that promotes the advancement of Hispanics in STEM fields. They provide professional development, networking opportunities, and support for Hispanic students and professionals.

title: National Society of Black Engineers (NSBE)
description: NSBE is a student-governed organization that aims to increase the number of culturally responsible Black engineers who excel academically, succeed professionally, and positively impact the community.

title: PwC's Start Internship Program
description: PwC's Start Internship Program provides opportunities for underrepresented students to gain valuable work experience and professional development through paid internships at PwC.

title: Circles
description: Circles is a national nonprofit organization that empowers and equips underrepresented students for career success through mentorship, leadership development, and professional opportunities.

title: Accenture's Student Leadership Development Program
description: Accenture's Student Leadership Development Program offers leadership training, networking events, and mentorship to underrepresented students interested in technology and consulting careers.

title: National Society of Accountants
description: The National Society of Accountants (NSA) is a professional organization that provides resources, education, and advocacy for accountants and tax professionals, including student members.

title: Toastmasters International
description: Toastmasters International is a nonprofit educational organization that teaches public speaking and leadership skills through a worldwide network of clubs.

title: DoSomething.org
description: DoSomething.org is a global nonprofit organization that encourages young people to get involved in social causes and make a positive impact in their communities.

title: Sales and Marketing Professionals (SMP)
description: Sales and Marketing Professionals (SMP) is a student-led organization that provides networking opportunities, professional development, and mentorship for those interested in sales and marketing careers.
